title: Set Default Push Branch Name
description: When working with Git, it is common to push your local changes to a remote repository. By default, Git will push your changes to a branch with the same name as your local branch. However, sometimes you may want to push your changes to a different branch. In this lab, you will learn how to set the default push branch name to the name of the current local branch.

meta.title: Git | Remote Repository | Push Branch
meta.description: Learn how to set the default push branch name to the name of the current local branch in Git, making it easier to push changes to a remote repository.
meta.keywords: Git, Remote Repository, Push Branch, Default Push Branch Name

verify.name: Verify that the default push is successfully set
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 设置默认推送分支名称
i18n.description: 使用Git时，将本地更改推送到远程存储库是常见操作。默认情况下，Git会将更改推送到与本地分支同名的分支。然而，有时你可能想将更改推送到不同分支。在本实验中，你将学习如何将默认推送分支名称设置为当前本地分支的名称。

meta.title: Git | 远程存储库 | 推送分支
meta.description: 学习如何在Git中将默认推送分支名称设置为当前本地分支的名称，以便更轻松地将更改推送到远程存储库。
meta.keywords: Git, 远程存储库, 推送分支, 默认推送分支名称

steps.title: 设置默认推送分支名称

verify.name: 验证默认推送是否成功设置
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
